column4: Hello.  I have attempted to reinstall drivers on my new installation of nVidia drivers on Ubuntu, but X will not function after I do.  It would not do this, however, when my card's settings appeared to be erased, and I was stuck with the generic defaults.
Would anyone know of any useful techniques other than nvidia-xconfig to install nVidia drivers?
did you ever bother to modprobe nvidia?
I'm not so familiar with modprobe.
it's a bit like installing a lamp but leaving out the bulb..without the driver loaded into the kernel you don't get anywhere
